title: Cat. 120  Fox, Busts of Two Women, and a Rabbit, headpiece for Le sourire (The Smile), 1899/1900
publication_title: Gauguin Paintings, Sculpture, and Graphic Works at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">Fox, Busts of Two Women, and a Rabbit, headpiece for Le sourire (The Smile)  
1899/1900  
Recto: first state of three  
Verso: third state of three  
Wood-block print in black ink on cream Japanese paper (recto); wood-block print in black ink over blue and green pencil on cream Japanese paper (verso); 105 × 185 mm (image, recto); 110 ×185 mm (image, verso); 115 × 196 mm (sheet)  
The Art Institute of Chicago, Clarence Buckingham Collection, 1951.35  
Guérin 76, Kornfeld 69 I/III

Fox, Busts of Two Women, and a Rabbit, headpiece for Le sourire (The Smile)  
1899/1900  
Third state of three  
Wood-block print in black ink on thin ivory Japanese paper, laid down on ivory Japanese paper; 103 × 186 mm (image); 123 × 228 mm (max.) (sheet); 142 × 333 mm (secondary support)  
Signed recto, lower left, in brush and black ink: PG.  
The Art Institute of Chicago, gift of Edward McCormick Blair, 2002.258  
Guérin 76, Kornfeld 69 III/III, A

Fox, Busts of Two Women, and a Rabbit, headpiece for Le sourire (The Smile)  
1899/1900  
Third state of three  
Wood-block print in black on thin, ivory Japanese paper; 117 × 186 mm (image); 149 × 230 mm (sheet)  
Signed recto, lower left, in pen and black ink: PG. 20  
The Art Institute of Chicago, Frank B. Hubachek Collection, 1948.18  
Guérin 76, Kornfeld 69 III/III, A

</section><section epub:type="footnotes" id="footnotes">The verso was not documented in the catalogue raisonné of Gauguin’s prints. See Elizabeth Mongan, Eberhard W. Kornfeld, and Harold Joachim, Paul Gauguin: Catalogue Raisonné of His Prints, with assistance of Christine H. Stauffer (Galerie Kornfeld, 1988), p. XX, cat. 69.

The verso was not documented in the catalogue raisonné of Gauguin’s prints. See Elizabeth Mongan, Eberhard W. Kornfeld, and Harold Joachim, Paul Gauguin: Catalogue Raisonné of His Prints, with assistance of Christine H. Stauffer (Galerie Kornfeld, 1988), p. XX, cat. 69.

</section><section id="figures">Top left, Fox, Busts of Two Women, and a Rabbit, headpiece for Le sourire (The Smile), 1899/1900 (cat. 120.1). Top right, Fox, Busts of Two Women, and a Rabbit, headpiece for Le sourire (The Smile), 1899/1900 (cat. 120.2). Bottom, Fox, Busts of Two Women, and a Rabbit, headpiece for Le sourire (The Smile), 1899/1900 (cat. 120.3).

</section>
